Thanks Joel. Just checking if these changes were made? Could be a caching issue on my end
  • Move hero image to sit underneath the first headline (see screenshot for visual)
  • Just a minor edit to make is on the button at the very bottom that says 'back to home' can we replace 'home' with 'top' and just have it go back to the 'Seasonal Dreamscape' homepage
Warm regards, Keenan Druce Creative Lead T: +61 1800 626 462 Level 43, 264 George Street, Sydney, NSW, 2000 acoufelt.com

Hi Keenan,

Confirming we have updated the pages.

https://acoufelt.com.au/seasonal-dreamscapes/

Hey Joel,

I hope you had a great weekend.

Are you able to upload all these videos to their respective colour pages and replace the hero images with the videos and as for the image can they sit underneath the first headline (see screenshot for visual)

Just a minor edit to make is on the button at the very bottom that says 'back to home' can we replace 'home' with 'top' and just have it go back to the 'Seasonal Dreamscape' homepage.

Is it all possible of being able to give us each colour page as its own URL too, we will be doing some EDMs and it would be great if we could the specific URLs (eg acoufelt.com.au/seasonal-dreamscape/valentine). Let me know if possible.

That is it, should be good to go live on Thursday.

If you have any questions, please let me know

Videos

Warm regards,

Keenan Druce
